description:
During Yuzu`s daily routine of stalking through her sister, Akane`s trash, Guri suddenly appears and the two girls begin taking love consultations at school. Seiji and Akane reluctantly agree to help look for coupling candidates and soon the group thinks they have found a pair of ideal targets. However, things get much more complicated when no one can agree if the intended couple really share each other`s feelings. In the midst of all this Yuzu and Guri scheme an elaborate plan to prove their instincts are right.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kunsuka Kunsuka x Seiji-kun o Kizutsukete Ii no wa... Watashi dake na no
Snif, snif × La seule autorisée à toucher à seiji... c`est moi
Sniff Sniff x The Only One Who May Hurt Seiji-kun... Is Me
くんすかくんすか × 青司くんを傷つけていいのは... 私だけなの
